topics.author: 31bee2686368722a0df23600

topics.body:
"@twistedmetalero":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/539f7a2d6368723aa7740300#post_539f7a2d6368723aa7740300
"@Gizoid101":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/539f7aef636872393c0a0000#post_539f7aef636872393c0a0000

I don't know the history of it, so I don't know what the purpose is other than an excuse for people to produce and consume adorable Satyr-based images or green-text. But the basic premise floats on the something akin to Anon getting to Equestria, being lewd, and knocking up a character (or several, or several different anons bang several, whatever. They openly permit variation and there's no organized "canon") that produces pony-styled Satyr offspring.

Images and greentext - as far as I've read and follow here on Derpibooru - tend to explore one of the many possible universes in the Satyr thread and the functional/dysfunctional family relationship between Anon, the pones, and the Satyrs.

It's strange, but it's kind of fun and there's a charming thing to it. And they seem to know how to hold a thing going if it's been a thing for 54 threads and more than a year at least.
topics.author: 4fe4bf947f123b175b000001
